languages.text: "Ксенос ставит условия — как же плохо Вьятт тебя выдрессировала. Я все больше задаюсь вопросом, зачем ей в слугах такой своенравный нелюдь?"
"The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос ставит условия — как же плохо Вьятт тебя выдрессировала. Я все больше задаюсь вопросом, зачем ей в слугах такой своенравный нелюдь?"

traits.locale_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep wondering why she would want to keep such an uncontrollable creature at her beck and call."
"The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep wondering why she would want to keep such an uncontrollable creature at her beck and call."
"The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I've always wondered why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."
"The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I've always wondered why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."
"The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."
"The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

languages.text: “这个异形以为她可以对我们发号施令，维亚特对她真是缺乏管教。我不禁怀疑，维亚特为什么会允许这么一个不守规矩的家伙做她的侍从呢？”
languages.original_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

traits.locale_text: “这个异形以为她可以对我们发号施令，维亚特对她真是缺乏管教。我不禁怀疑，维亚特为什么会允许这么一个不守规矩的家伙做她的侍从呢？”
“这个异形以为她可以对我们发号施令，维亚特对她真是缺乏管束。我一直在思考，维亚特为什么会允许这么一个不守规矩的家伙做她的侍从呢？”

languages.text: «La xenos cree que puede establecer los términos; es evidente que Vyatt es una domadora pésima. No dejo de preguntarme para qué quiere a una criatura tan indisciplinada a su servicio».
languages.original_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

traits.locale_text: «La xenos cree que puede establecer los términos; es evidente que Vyatt es una domadora pésima. No dejo de preguntarme para qué quiere a una criatura tan indisciplinada a su servicio».

languages.text: « La xénos pense pouvoir nous dicter ses conditions. Vyatt est une bien mauvaise maîtresse. Je me demande pourquoi elle tient à conserver une créature aussi rebelle à ses côtés. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

traits.locale_text: « La xénos pense pouvoir nous dicter ses conditions. Vyatt est une bien mauvaise maîtresse. Je me demande pourquoi elle tient à conserver une créature aussi rebelle à ses côtés. »

languages.text: 「その異種族は私たちに条件を突きつけられると思っているようです。ビャットの制御能力はまったくお粗末ですね。なぜ彼女が、あんな手に負えない生き物を従わせておきたいと思うのか、私はずっと疑問に思っています」
languages.original_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

traits.locale_text: 「その異種族は私たちに条件を突きつけられると思っているようです。ビャットの制御能力はまったくお粗末ですね。なぜ彼女が、あんな手に負えない生き物を従わせておきたいと思うのか、私はずっと疑問に思っています」

languages.text: "Zeno bize emir verebileceğini sanıyor. Vyatt da ne kötü terbiyeciymiş. Elini sallasa ellisi, neden bu asi yaratığı yanı başında tutuyor diye kendime sorup duruyorum."
languages.original_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

traits.locale_text: "Zeno bize emir verebileceğini sanıyor. Vyatt da ne kötü terbiyeciymiş. Elini sallasa ellisi, neden bu asi yaratığı yanı başında tutuyor diye kendime sorup duruyorum."

languages.text: "Die Xenos meint, sie könne uns Bedingungen vorgeben – Vyatt ist in der Tat keine gute Herrin. Ich frage mich, warum sie eine so aufsässige Kreatur unter ihrem Befehl duldet."
languages.original_text: "The xenos thinks she can dictate terms to us — Vyatt is a poor handler indeed. I keep asking myself why she would want to keep such an unruly creature at her beck and call."

traits.locale_text: "Die Xenos meint, sie könne uns Bedingungen vorgeben – Vyatt ist in der Tat keine gute Herrin. Ich frage mich, warum sie eine so aufsässige Kreatur unter ihrem Befehl duldet."
